item.description:
I realize that this is last minute but for those who weren't at the last meeting, I am writing to let you know that we will be having a meeting tomorrow, Sunday, from 3:00 - 4:30. We will be saving the last 30 minutes, 4:30-5:00, to provide an introduction to the Course for those that are less famliar with its origins.

We will continue to look at specific workbook lessons and to focus on the Course's rather non-traditional view of forgiveness.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Meetup Group
